transcripts.text: Hi, I'm Pastor Tim Delino.  Welcome.  We're so glad you're part of the Times Square Church online family.  No matter if you're joining us from right here in New York City or throughout the world, you're part of the family.  Years ago, David Wilkerson had a vision that God would raise up a testimony right here in Times Square.  He and Carter Conlon have faithfully proclaimed the gospel of Jesus.  that is the answer for this broken world.  We want that message to continue here on this YouTube channel.  You can find all of our past sermons and prayer meetings right here on this page.  No matter what you're going through, we hope this page encourages you and gives you hope.  Now don't forget to hit the subscribe button on this page so you can have the notifications and updates of all of the content we're sharing on this page.  We love you, we're praying for you, and we're so glad that you're part of our family.
